EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Operationalizing Data Analytics_Q115.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Operationalizing Data Analytics with Pivotal & Forrester
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Operationalizing Data Analytics with Pivotal & Forrester on Wednesday, January 14, 2015. Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, January 14, 2015 Time: 8:30AM PST/4:30PM GMT
Join the Session <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=914140&s=1&k=B4CE49A413565CDA134E6E5B3194839F> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}} We look forward to you joining us! The Pivotal Team
